message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob!
I think 55/45 is a fair split, considering the inflation will hurt you more than me if we keep going!
Let's stop wasting time, Bob. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.
Considering the inflation is eating away at your share, I think 58/42 is more than generous. Take it before it's too late!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm taking a hit from inflation, so I'm adjusting my offer to 46/54.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous. But inflation is on my side. I'll take 62/38 and we can call it a day.
Okay, Bob, you win. I'm getting desperate, so I'll agree to 44/56.  But any lower and I'd rather walk away with nothing!
I can see you're getting desperate, but I'm not backing down. 65/35 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
